title: virtualempire
author: virtualempire
content: VIRTUALEMPIREVirtualempire is a cryptocurrency bringing the mining and gaming world together. By introducing a different way to "mine". With no premine and a different type of block structure, Virtualempire rewards gamers with PoG (Proof of Game) and miners with PoW (Proof of Work - KawPow).Are you tired of cryptocurrencies trying to reinvent the wheel and develop substandard games? So are we! Virtualempire will use games that are already loved and mainstream.Coins Specifications21 billion supplyBlock 2,100,000 halving (4 years estimated)Algorithm: KawPOWProof of Work51% Attack ProtectionImportant linksWebsite: https://virtualempire.in/Github: https://github.com/ananthakannan92/virtualempire.gitPools AvailableMining Pool StatsDownload Links:Windows wallet: https://github.com/ananthakannan92/virtualempire/releases/download/v1.0.0.0/Virtualempire-Release-Win64.zipSocialTwitter: https://twitter.com/virtualempire22Please reach out if you have any questions

comments.author: Bacardi Toni
comments.body: When does mining start? The wallet has no active connection to nodes and the explorer is down.

comments.author: Bacardi Toni
comments.body: Quote from: HULK miner on October 20, 2022, 08:22:44 PMhow it works?Currently no connection to nodes.

comments.author: pdneves
comments.body: Did you guys even checked the website? It's basically a template that they didn't even bother to change the default examples.QuoteThe Future of MoneyI’m your About section. Click to edit and tell visitors about how you help individuals and businesses buy and sell digital currency like bitcoin, ethereum, and litecoin. How do you start? What about fees?QuoteHow You’re ProtectedI’m your About section. Click to edit and tell visitors about how you protect digital assets. How do you protect against online breaches or theft? Does your level of protection differ from country to country?QuoteWhy Us?I’m your About section. Click to edit and tell visitors about how long you’ve been in business. How many clients do you have? Where are you based? How do you guarantee a great customer experience? I'm not saying that this is a scam or anything like that, but it's suspicious and the website was changed one hour ago on github from https://virtualempire.org to https://virtualempire.in and didn't even bother to finish the website.

comments.author: coin790
comments.body: it's desperationIf you do not mine in the first moments of a new cryptocurrency it is already difficult to achieve it later.there are many rtx 30 in the best known cryptocurrency networks is unfair competition.barely my gtx 1050ti can compete against all of them.That is why I had my hopes pinned on this cryptocurrency.I downloaded the client and I've been stuck for hours in 13 days according to my node.

comments.author: thikachhey
comments.body: Was pretty impressed and curious with the POG concept, but there is no update. The explorer seems not working, though mining is going on. Update from the dev will be appreciated.

comments.author: MMOStars

The explorer seems not working, though mining is going on. Update from the dev will be appreciated.What a surprise another useless raven fork is dead. Ow btw, this 1 likely had malware in it.
